epic.name: Provide more and better publicized Alloy samples & demos
epic.summary: Make existing and new Alloy samples & demos more prominent and available

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description: Per conversations with Federico, we should revisit the current mix of demo apps included in the Alloy repo. Some may no longer be needed. We may be missing samples that would have a higher benefit to developers. Having a well-planned list will matter more once the sample apps are better publicized and more easily available to developers.
fields.summary: Update and prioritize the samples in the Alloy repo
